pkgmetadata.longdescription: Official Client for 'Jazz' // This is the official 'Jazz' client. 'Jazz' is a lightweight modular data processing framework, including a web server. It provides data persistence and computation capabilities accessible from 'R' and 'Python' and also through a REST API. https://github.com/bbvadata/Jazz See ?rjazz::rjazz to get a 'Jazz' server.
